Engineering Related Employment History
Oleo International: Coventry 	Job title: Technical Accounts Manager 		(01/2019 – Current)
Oleo International are leading energy absorption specialists. Design, manufacture and install energy absorption buffers for the Rail, Buffer-Stop and Industrial sectors.
Providing an array of technical solutions to Distributors, OEM’S and End Users through tools such as Impact simulation software, hand calculations and generating detailed technical reports.
Providing commercial support regarding tenders, quotes and detailed proposals.
Exposure to and building International customer base through managing and delegating tasks within our internal international departments.
Leading projects, long term and short term, as well as organising and attending site visits,
Responsible for all UK Buffer Stop and rail sales. With added support to international enquiries.
RG Luma: Worcester 		Job title: Technical Sales/Applications Engineer 	(01/2018 – 01/2019)
RG Luma Automation have over 30 years of industry experience delivering bespoke special purpose machinery and related automated solutions to customers. Working within an innovative automation company that specialise in Special Purpose Machine design and manufacture for copious industries has really expanded and rounded my skill set. Some of the responsibilities include:
Preparing concepts, tenders, proposals and quotations
Providing pre-sales and post-sales support
Negotiating contracts, terms and conditions
Meeting regular sales targets and coordinating sales projects
Identifying and establishing new customers
Organising sales visits
Liaising with existing high profile customers
Making technical presentations and demonstrate how a product meets customers’ requirements
Liaising with other members of the sales team and other technical experts
Balancing potentially highly valuable projects at any one time.
Baxi Boilers: Warwick 		Job title: Design Engineer 				(10/2016 – 01/2018)
Providing heating and plumbing designs for new build properties for major house-builders in full compliance with legislative requirements using AUTOCAD software.
Provide a follow up service to clients regarding technical enquiries relating to the specific projects and company products
Support a follow up design service, including provision of handover documentation and performance details relative to the system design.
I create and manage spreadsheets using Excel for data capture and update as necessary, create and maintain documents using word as required.
Muller Wiseman Dairies: Droitwich-Spa 	 (Summer Engineering Internship)		(05/2015 - 10/2015)
Placed in the engineering department where I worked closely with twenty-four maintenance engineers who essentially maintained efficient manufacture and production throughout the site. Undertaking projects under strict deadlines, co-operating with other sectors within the department. I was put on a variety of jobs, constantly fed new challenges. Following procedures were paramount to ensure good safety and practice. Some examples of what I accomplished are;
Resealing and servicing compressor air boost units.
Wiring and servicing motors for assembly line.
Designing and producing brackets from sheet metal for various componen

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
